record1.<1>:
declare function restostring
$insert rdkdeploy_equates

Equ TRUE$			to 1
Equ FALSE$			to 0

Declare function RdkGetTypeFromHierarchy, RdkGetClassFromHierarchy
Declare function Dialog_Box, Repos_Resolve_Entity

SelItem = @CtrlEntId->SelPos_Ex
ExSelected = SelItem<1>
MDIFrame	= Get_Property( @window, 'MDIFRAME' )
AllTypes	= .Type_List->List
If SelItem<2> = 3 then
	EveryThing = @CtrlEntID->LIST_EX

	reposType = RdkGetTypeFromHierarchy(Everything, ExSelected, AllTypes )
	If reposType <> "" then
		reposClass = RdkGetClassFromHierarchy(Everything, ExSelected)
		EntId = "~*" : reposType : "*" : reposClass : "*" : Everything<ExSelected>[5, 999]
		entBody = Repos_Resolve_Entity( entID )
    
		if len( entBody ) then
			notUsed = Dialog_Box(DLG_ENTPROPS$, MDIFrame, entId : @RM : entBody)
		end
	end
end

return 0
